content:
Hi there! Have there been any detailed discussions on the DaVinci Lab Reporting use case? If so, can you point me to any minutes, notes, or other documentation that can help me identify where we are on this? Based on the Da Vinci Use Case page on Confluence (https://confluence.hl7.org/display/DVP/Da+Vinci+Use+Cases), it seems not. I just want to be sure.
Thanks!
@May Terry We have not ramped up work on this use case yet. I recommend subscribing to the Da Vinci listserv for future announcements regarding our use cases and updates. Thanks!
Thanks @Viet Nguyen - I'll monitor the listservs for when this work actively begins in Da Vinci.
